title: Frameworks for Language Teaching
description:
Scanned PDF

Published by the School for International Training and McGraw Hill. Written by Joshua Kurzweil and Mary Scholl. This book is primarily for teacher trainers who are working with ESL/EFL teachers in training. The book is divided into three theme (Individual Studentand Learning, Designing a Learning Expereince, Supporting a Learning Experience) with two chapeters in each theme.

Publisher: McGraw Hill Higher Education (July 1, 2006) 
Language: English 
ISBN-10: 0073533815 
ISBN-13: 978-0073533810
